function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of drones for public announcements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of drones for mass temperature screening","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential invasion of privacy due to constant surveillance by pandemic drones","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hazardous exposure to disinfectant chemicals due to drone spraying","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of technological failure leading to delay in delivery of medical supplies","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid delivery of medicines and supplies using drones","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of drones for crowd surveillance and disinfection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear government regulatory policies for integrating uavs in the covid-19 impact response system","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the use of drones for delivery","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on drone technology may lead to a reduction in human-to-human interactions, impacting social interactions and community cohesion","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vulnerabilities in drone operations, such as gps jamming and hacking, make drones an attractive prospect for malicious users to conduct cyberterrorism and other unlawful activities.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Beyond visible line of sight bvlos drone operations remain somewhat unsafe, requiring technological and operational guidelines for safe operations.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uavs face constraints in terms of battery life and load capacity, inhibiting their capability to cover long distances and make multiple deliveries at once.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Robots in hospitals could malfunction and spread infection instead of containing it.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on robot technology may lead to reduced human oversight and care.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High demand for autonomous disinfection robots could lead to shortages and delays in deployment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to contaminated surfaces in hospitals and healthcare settings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential exposure to infected individuals during sample collection and patient support","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of virus transmission through traditional delivery mechanisms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable devices may lead to false alarms or misdiagnosis of covid-19 symptoms, leading to unnecessary panic or burden on healthcare systems.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable devices collecting and transmitting health data may pose privacy and security risks, potentially leading to unauthorized access or misuse of sensitive personal information.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on wearables for health monitoring may lead to neglect of traditional healthcare practices and face-to-face medical consultations, resulting in delayed or inadequate medical care for non-covid-19 related conditions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable may not accurately measure respiratory rates, leading to false notifications and undermining user trust.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data collection from wearable devices may raise privacy concerns and lead to misuse of personal health information.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The use of workplace contact tracing wearables may create a sense of surveillance and distrust among employees.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable devices may not accurately capture and report the wearer’s health status, leading to unreliable data.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on smartphone applications for real-time health data could lead to privacy and security risks.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disposal of the biosensor patches may lead to potential disease spread.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on a single device for remote health monitoring","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate data validation leading to false alarms or missed critical symptoms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overreliance on technology for diagnosis and assessment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential interruption of supply chains and delivery of wearables due to lockdowns and disruptions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concerns about the battery life of smart wearables","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of established guidelines for the use of private data accumulated by wearables","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of mobile applications for covid-19 impact management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adoption of blockchain technology for covid-19 apps","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of integration of verified data sources in blockchain apps","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using blockchain to associate people’s official ids with covid-19 status and movement permissions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sharing verified health and location information among individuals, authorities, and hospitals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of gis data for covid-19 mapping","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Bluetooth contact tracing for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited adoption of contact tracing apps","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to contact tracing","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliability of contact tracing data","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of bluetooth for tracking covid-19 spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of gps for monitoring covid-19 positive patients","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The app may not accurately determine whether an individual has been exposed to a potential covid-19 patient, leading to false alerts or a lack of necessary alerts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns surrounding the use of gps technology could lead to public distrust and reluctance to use the app","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid and widespread adoption of the app without adequate understanding of its limitations and capabilities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to data collection and usage by the contact tracing app","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
